basic.Source: Pelophylax nigromaculatus (Black-spotted frog) (Rana nigromaculata) (frog skin active peptide)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.11682065]Gram-positive bacterium:Micrococcus luteus(MIC=2.5μg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Shigella dysenteriae(MIC=10μg/ml), Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=10μg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=75μg/ml), Salmonella typhimurium(MIC=22.5μg/ml), Proteus mirabilis(MIC>200μg/ml), Serratia marcescens(MIC>200μg/ml);Yeast:Candida albicans(MIC=100μg/ml).
